abstract: The horror filmmaker Eli Roth explores the nature of evil with a new Discovery Channel special.
snippet: The horror filmmaker Eli Roth explores the nature of evil with a new Discovery Channel special.
lead_paragraph: The horror filmmaker Eli Roth's gory "Hostel" helped to define a subgenre often referred to as torture porn. As an actor in the World War II revenge fantasy "Inglourious Basterds," he played a vigilante soldier who beat Nazis to death with a baseball bat.

headline.main: Touch of Evil: Eli Roth Recreates Infamous Experiment for Discovery Channel
